Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 224th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/16/2019...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2019, going 3-0, 0.97...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2019, going 21-6, 3.19 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2020, going 5-1, 0.94...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/15/2021, off Carey Secrest (HOU)...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,564,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/15/2022 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/5/2022 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2022, winning 2 games with a 1.38 ERA...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,564,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Montreal on 2/4/2023 (Going to CIN: P Donnie Kopp, CF James Ostrowski, P Philip Lund, CF Hector Huerta, 1B Darrell Coleman. Going to MON: P Matthew Gordillo, RF Patricio
Garza, 1B Manuel Cambra, RF Troy Burrier)...
Injured on 3/8/2023 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
